english: How long has your knee been hurting you?
It's been a couple of weeks.
Have you ever injured your knee?
mixtec: Á ta̠kuě'e̠ ko̠ndo̠-un tá xina'á á vichin?
U̠'un. Köñú'u ini-i tu ni̠ta̠xin ko̠ndo̠-i.

english: Does your work require you to do a lot of kneeling?
Does your knee ever give way or buckle when you walk?
Does your knee sometimes lock so that you cannot completely straighten your leg?
mixtec: Á ndíta ndútuun ko̠ndo̠-un, kökuvi ndundǎku-ña?

english: Does your knee feel stiff when you get up in the morning?
Yes, it's worse in the morning.
I'm going to examine your knee while you are standing, sitting, and lying down.
mixtec: Koto ndosó-i ko̠ndo̠-un tá ndíchi-un, tá índu'ú-un, tá kándú'u-un.
